job.title: Data Scientist Intern
job.description:
iSmile Technologies is a global IT services company that helps other businesses grow and compete by adopting disruptive technologies to increase agility such as Cloud transformation, Digital transformation, Managed services, and DevOps transformation. We also provide big data management solutions and IoT solutions. We focus on building long term relationships with our clients and view ourselves as a strategic extension of other organizations. Services such as designing, implementing, and managing systems directly contribute to their revenue and business success. 

 

The Data Scientist Internship (Unpaid) role requires highly analytical engineers/developers to work in sync with our AI team in analyzing the latest trends and patterns in Big Data and in transforming complex data sets into meaningful conclusions and recommendations. The candidate must have knowledge on machine learning algorithms, MLpipelines, ML Ops, Kubeflow Pipelines and deep learning frameworks.  

   

 Tasks include:  

   

  • Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns  
  • Combine models through ensemble modeling  
  • Select and use the right tools, frameworks, languages, and technologies for the job, preferably open-source solutions  
  • Collect, organize and process data in collaboration with the AI team  
  •  Python and Bash scripting for development of product features  
  •  Automate infrastructure that the data science team uses  
  •  Designing an integrated ML Pipeline with TFX  
  •  Automating the ML pipeline using Kubeflow Pipelines  

   

  

 Required Qualifications:  

  • Pursuing or has obtained a B.S.Degree in field related to artificial intelligence, computer science or data science  
  • Open-source frameworks: Python, R, Spark, Hadoop  
  • Work environment: GitHub, Git, Agile, Scrum  
  • Strong communication, time-management, organization, and prioritization skills  
  • Demonstrated critical thinking and problem-solving skills  
  • Understanding of Machine Learning theory and techniques  

  

  • Note: This is an unpaid opportunity to work remotely.
